# Pip packages for the acap environment
# Installed via: uv pip install --python <prefix>/bin/python -r pip-packages.txt

alpha-vantage
bta-lib
exchange_calendars
ib_insync
iexfinance
pandas-market-calendars
python-binance
tushare
xbbg

# Quant
lean
quantconnect-stubs

# Data
cachier
clickhouse-connect
country-converter
singleton_decorator

# Plotting
kaleido

# Numpy extensions
numpy_ext
trendln

# Dev tools
autofake
doq
neovim-remote

# Config & env
python-dotenv
nbformat

# Microsoft integration
O365
